## MPV Dataset

```{r}
police_dept_plot = 
  mpv_df %>% 
  group_by(police_dept) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  filter(n >= 49) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = police_dept, color = police_dept)) + geom_histogram()
```
